players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I was the detective, I investigated Bob and found he's the mafia. Vote him."
You: "I think Bob is mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Alice is the culprit."
You: "Charlie, your investigation is solid. Bob is mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and confirmed he's mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice is the culprit."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Alice: "Charlie, your investigation is solid. Bob is mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and confirmed he's mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice is the culprit."
